Name: oid
Description: Row identifier (hidden attribute; must be explicitly\nselected)

Name: conname
Description: Constraint name (not necessarily unique!)

Name: connamespace
Description: The OID of the namespace that contains this constraint

Name: contype
Description: c = check constraint, f = foreign key constraint, p = primary key constraint, u = unique constraint, t =\nconstraint trigger, x = exclusion constraint

Name: condeferrable
Description: Is the constraint deferrable?

Name: condeferred
Description: Is the constraint deferred by default?

Name: convalidated
Description: Has the constraint been validated? Currently, can only be false\nfor foreign keys and CHECK constraints

Name: conrelid
Description: The table this constraint is on; 0 if not a table\nconstraint

Name: contypid
Description: The domain this constraint is on; 0 if not a domain\nconstraint

Name: conindid
Description: The index supporting this constraint, if it's a unique, primary\nkey, foreign key, or exclusion constraint; else 0

Name: confrelid
Description: If a foreign key, the referenced table; else 0

Name: confupdtype
Description: Foreign key update action code: a = no\naction, r = restrict, c = cascade, n = set null, d = set default

Name: confdeltype
Description: Foreign key deletion action code: a =\nno action, r = restrict, c = cascade, n = set null, d = set default

Name: confmatchtype
Description: Foreign key match type: f = full,\np = partial, s = simple

Name: conislocal
Description: This constraint is defined locally for the relation. Note that\na constraint can be locally defined and inherited simultaneously.

Name: coninhcount
Description: The number of direct inheritance ancestors this constraint has.\nA constraint with a nonzero number of ancestors cannot be dropped nor renamed.

Name: connoinherit
Description: This constraint is defined locally for the relation. It is a\nnon-inheritable constraint.

Name: conkey
Description: If a table constraint (including foreign keys, but not\nconstraint triggers), list of the constrained columns

Name: confkey
Description: If a foreign key, list of the referenced columns

Name: conpfeqop
Description: If a foreign key, list of the equality operators for PK = FK\ncomparisons

Name: conppeqop
Description: If a foreign key, list of the equality operators for PK = PK\ncomparisons

Name: conffeqop
Description: If a foreign key, list of the equality operators for FK = FK\ncomparisons

Name: conexclop
Description: If an exclusion constraint, list of the per-column exclusion\noperators

Name: conbin
Description: If a check constraint, an internal representation of the\nexpression

Name: consrc
Description: If a check constraint, a human-readable representation of the\nexpression
